医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
跨文化研究揭示了音乐心理表征的共性和差异当听音乐时，人脑似乎偏向于听到并产生由简单整数比率组成的节奏-；例如，由相等的时间间隔分隔开的一系列四个节拍（形成 1:1:1 的比例）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Cross-culture-study-reveals-commonality-and-variation-in-mental-representations-of-music.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Cross-culture-study-reveals-commonality-and-variation-in-mental-representations-of-music.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bec9a41e-df80-40da-8cad-ce5290009116 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 11:11:56 -0500 Cross-cultural study reveals commonality and variation in mental representations of music
研究凸显欧洲各地肺癌治疗机会的差异在早期肺癌患者的报销和获得新治疗方面，欧洲国家之间存在明显差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-highlights-disparities-in-lung-cancer-treatment-access-across-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-highlights-disparities-in-lung-cancer-treatment-access-across-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a10a38cb-be39-432c-8ee9-f3bffed4f4fe Mon, 04 Mar 2024 11:07:17 -0500 Study highlights disparities in lung cancer treatment access across Europe
研究发现，运动可以改善学童的健康和体能由 UGR 体育教育和运动系的研究人员领导的一项研究，与格拉纳达圣女德拉斯尼韦斯大学医院儿科内分泌科的儿科医生以及外部国家和国际合作伙伴合作，表明锻炼的学童可以改善他们的身体素质健身和健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Exercise-improves-health-and-fitness-in-schoolchildren-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Exercise-improves-health-and-fitness-in-schoolchildren-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cc4e97a-382a-4e97-bdc7-c86500415d27 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 10:57:00 -0500 Exercise improves health and fitness in schoolchildren, study finds
在护理教育中使用模拟来优化学习成果不仅要多练习，还要正确练习。阿格德尔大学的新研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Using-simulations-in-nursing-education-to-optimize-learning-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Using-simulations-in-nursing-education-to-optimize-learning-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bb1f5d3-af4b-4957-a367-bd3144b3eb46 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 10:52:46 -0500 Using simulations in nursing education to optimize learning outcomes
创新水凝胶为海水淡化和生物医学应用提供解决方案UPC 材料与分子工程创新研究组 - 用于再生治疗的生物材料 (IMEM-BRT) 的研究人员正在研究一种具有多种应用的热敏水凝胶，例如利用太阳辐射淡化海水以及为半成品制造新型生物医学粘合剂。 -侵入性治疗和医学诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Innovative-Hydrogel-offers-solutions-for-water-desalination-and-biomedical-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Innovative-Hydrogel-offers-solutions-for-water-desalination-and-biomedical-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4810251d-04e7-46bc-a089-bdb0e277b709 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 10:46:00 -0500 Innovative hydrogel offers solutions for water desalination and biomedical applications
打破流动：Naseri 博士增强女性健康的革命性方法采访女性健康公司 Qvin 的首席执行官兼联合创始人 Sara Naseri 博士。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Disrupting-the-Flow-Dr-Naseris-Revolutionary-Approach-to-Empowering-Womens-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Disrupting-the-Flow-Dr-Naseris-Revolutionary-Approach-to-Empowering-Womens-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26ab8279-f555-4941-8148-80f72aa6b53a Mon, 04 Mar 2024 09:25:00 -0500 Disrupting the Flow: Dr. Naseri's Revolutionary Approach to Empowering Women's Health
供应链评估与管理，优化医药供应链在本次采访中，News Med 与 Joseph P. Ivan 谈论了优化药品供应链的综合评估和管理方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Supply-chain-assessment-and-management-optimizing-pharmaceutical-supply-chains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Supply-chain-assessment-and-management-optimizing-pharmaceutical-supply-chains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dcdebd8-f471-4e12-9644-0aab4e4b3de7 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 09:03:00 -0500 Supply chain assessment and management, optimizing pharmaceutical supply chains
铁失调被认为是长期新冠肺炎的潜在触发因素新研究发现，由于 SARS-CoV-2 感染，血液中的铁含量以及人体调节这种重要营养素的能力出现问题，可能是长期感染新冠病毒的关键触发因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Iron-dysregulation-identified-as-潜在-trigger-for-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Iron-dysregulation-identified-as-潜在-trigger-for-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed56c5e2-8214-4240-bd06-ee852ac46960 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 09:00:32 -0500 Iron dysregulation identified as potential trigger for long COVID
用 Quorn 代替肉类可降低 10% 的坏胆固醇定期用肉类替代 Quorn 等真菌蛋白可以帮助降低 10% 的坏胆固醇，这与改用地中海饮食或纯素饮食相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Substituting-meat-with-Quorn-can-lower-bad-cholesterol-by-1025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Substituting-meat-with-Quorn-can-lower-bad-cholesterol-by-1025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1761ca91-cb98-4a3e-bdaa-f7a98cd6cf2a Mon, 04 Mar 2024 08:40:38 -0500 Substituting meat with Quorn can lower bad cholesterol by 10%
遗传风险信息可实现量身定制的乳腺癌筛查赫尔辛基大学研究人员的最新研究结果表明，遗传风险信息可以帮助更有效地为受益最大的女性定制和定位乳腺癌筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Genetic-risk-information-enables-tailored-breast-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Genetic-risk-information-enables-tailored-breast-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f21a98a-c3f4-410c-8613-4fa5a9bf092e Mon, 04 Mar 2024 08:29:11 -0500 Genetic risk information enables tailored breast cancer screening
